name: Cyclizar
flavorText: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

previous.name: Revavroom
previous.flavorText: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders—now numbering eight—to generate energy.

next.name: Orthworm
next.flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will wield the tendrils on its body like fists and pelt the opponent with a storm of punches.
